8 #include <pheromones/FunctionCallArgumentDTO.h>

10 constexpr uint8_t RATE_HZ{10};
11 
12 class Logger : public ILogger {
13  public:
14  Logger() {}
15 
16  LogRet log(LogLevel level, const char* format, ...) override {
17  va_list args;
18  va_start(args, format);
19  int retVal = formatAndAppend(format, args);
20  va_end(args);
21 
22  flush(level);
23 
24  if (retVal >= 0) {
25  return LogRet::Ok;
26  } else {
27  return LogRet::Error;
28  }
29  }
30 
31  int formatAndAppend(const char* format, va_list args) {
32  // Copy varargs
33  va_list vaCopy;
34  va_copy(vaCopy, args);
35  const int requiredLength = std::vsnprintf(NULL, 0, format, vaCopy);
36  va_end(vaCopy);
37 
38  // Create a string with adequate length
39  std::string tmpStr;
40  tmpStr.resize((size_t)requiredLength);
41 
42  // Build a new string
43  int retValue = vsnprintf(tmpStr.data(), tmpStr.size() + 1, format, args);
44  m_accumulatedString = m_accumulatedString + tmpStr;
45 
46  return retValue;
47  }
48 
49  void flush(LogLevel level) {
50  switch (level) {
51  case LogLevel::Debug:
52  ROS_DEBUG("%s", m_accumulatedString.c_str());
53  break;
54  case LogLevel::Info:
55  ROS_INFO("%s", m_accumulatedString.c_str());
56  break;
57  case LogLevel::Warn:
58  ROS_WARN("%s", m_accumulatedString.c_str());
59  break;
60  case LogLevel::Error:
61  ROS_ERROR("%s", m_accumulatedString.c_str());
62  break;
63  }
64 
65  m_accumulatedString = "";
66  }
67 
68  private:
69  std::string m_accumulatedString;
70 };
71 
72 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
73  ros::init(argc, argv, "hive_mind_bridge");
74  ros::NodeHandle nodeHandle("~");
75 
76  int port = nodeHandle.param("TCP_SERVER_PORT", 7001);
77  std::string moveByTopic =
78  nodeHandle.param("moveByTopic", std::string("/agent_1/navigation/moveBy"));
79  ros::Publisher moveByPublisher =
80  nodeHandle.advertise<pioneer_2dx_msgs::MoveByMessage>(moveByTopic, 1000);
81  ROS_INFO("Publishing moveBy on %s", moveByPublisher.getTopic().c_str());
82  Logger logger;
83  HiveMindBridge bridge(port, logger, 5 * RATE_HZ);
84 
85  // Register custom actions
86  CallbackFunction moveByCallback = [&](CallbackArgs args) -> std::optional<CallbackReturn> {
87  pioneer_2dx_msgs::MoveByMessage moveByMessage;
88 
89  auto* x = std::get_if<float>(&args[0].getArgument());
90  auto* y = std::get_if<float>(&args[1].getArgument());
91 
92  if (x == nullptr || y == nullptr) {
93  ROS_WARN("Received invalid argument type in moveby");
94  return {};
95  }
96 
97  moveByMessage.distance_x = *x;
98  moveByMessage.distance_y = *y;
99 
100  // Publish on moveby
101  moveByPublisher.publish(moveByMessage);
102  return {};
103  };
104 
105  CallbackArgsManifest moveByManifest;
106  moveByManifest.push_back(
107  UserCallbackArgumentDescription("x", FunctionDescriptionArgumentTypeDTO::Float));
108  moveByManifest.push_back(
109  UserCallbackArgumentDescription("y", FunctionDescriptionArgumentTypeDTO::Float));
110  bridge.registerCustomAction("moveBy", moveByCallback, moveByManifest);
111 
112  CallbackFunction getStatus = [&](CallbackArgs args) -> std::optional<CallbackReturn> {
113  // todo This remains to be implemented.
114  int64_t isRobotOk = 1;
115 
116  CallbackArgs returnArgs;
117  returnArgs.push_back(FunctionCallArgumentDTO(isRobotOk));
118 
119  ROS_INFO("Getting status: %d", isRobotOk);
120  CallbackReturn cbReturn("getStatusReturn", returnArgs);
121 
122  return cbReturn;
123  };
124  bridge.registerCustomAction("getStatus", getStatus);
125 
126  // Register event hooks
127  bridge.onConnect([]() { ROS_INFO("Client connected."); });
128 
129  bridge.onDisconnect([]() { ROS_INFO("Client disconnected."); });
130 
131  ros::Rate loopRate(RATE_HZ);
132  while (ros::ok()) {
133  ros::spinOnce();
134 
135  bridge.spin();
136 
137  loopRate.sleep();
138  }
139 
140  return 0;
141 }
